function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to mobile applications used for pandemic management","Impact":"Potential breach of personal privacy and data security","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations, obtain user consent, and use secure data encryption methods","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure data storage, and user authentication methods","People":"Users of mobile applications, citizens, and individuals","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, app developers, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Dependency on big technology giants for pandemic preparedness","Impact":"Limited innovation and diversity in pandemic management solutions","Mitigation":"Encourage and support small companies and startups, promote collaboration between big and small tech companies, and provide funding for research and development","Technologies":"Open-source platforms, collaboration tools, and funding programs","People":"Small companies, startups, and research institutions","Owner":"Government agencies, funding organizations, and business associations"},{"Description":"Lack of coordination and data sharing for managing current and future outbreaks","Impact":"Inadequate response to pandemics and increased risk of spread","Mitigation":"Establish unified data sharing platforms, promote cross-sector collaboration, and implement standardized communication protocols","Technologies":"Data integration platforms, collaborative software, and communication protocols","People":"Governmental bodies, healthcare organizations, and public health agencies","Owner":"Intergovernmental organizations, public health agencies, and collaborative platforms"}]}
